^WARPSTAR-[A-F0-9]{6}-W$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=blank |oui=00:3A:9D |oui_eth=00:3A:9D }} [http://121ware.com/product/atermstation/product/warpstar/wr8170n-hp/ Product page] "48RNRA0K.0GA", "2010/04/07", "Welkin-HP", and "AL1-002484-00"<...> is silkscreened on the top of the board in the images provided by [[User:Mns|Mns]] below. :The 802.11bgn radio (AR9283) is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=958 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2598L / 2598L (19dbm) 2.4GHz power amplifier ICs]. ==Images== ===from [[User:Mns|Mns]]=== File:NEC Aterm WR8170N-HP external.jpeg [[Has images::external| ]] File:NEC Aterm WR8170N-HP board top.jpeg|board top File:NEC Aterm WR8170N-HP board bottom.jpeg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] == Serial port pinout == 
J2
(VCC) (GND) (N/A) (TX) (RX)
pin5  pin4  pin3  pin2  pin1
